epic_description: This document describes the technical design for automating inventory synchronization between warehouse management systems and the central inventory database. This change will enable real-time stock visibility across all distribution centers and retail locations.

This document describes the technical design for optimizing the order fulfillment process. The system will intelligently route orders to the optimal fulfillment location based on inventory availability, shipping costs, and delivery time requirements.

This document describes the technical design for optimizing warehouse slot allocation. The system will automatically assign optimal storage locations for incoming inventory based on velocity, size, and picking efficiency.

This document describes the technical design for supplier EDI gateway implementation. The system will support automated purchase order transmission, acknowledgments, advance ship notices, and invoice processing.

This document describes the technical design for shipment tracking dashboard. The system will integrate with carrier tracking systems, provide customer notifications, and support customer service operations.
